name: Lamplight Lounge
location: Disney California Adventure Park, Pixar Pier

items.title: Smoked Salmon Egg White Omelet
items.description: With Dill Cream Cheese, Avocado and Crispy Capers, served with Green Goddess Baby Gem Salad and Breakfast Potatoes

items.title: Brunch Burger*
items.description: Angus Beef, American Cheese, One Egg-up, Roasted Green Chile, Lettuce, Caramelized Onions and Paprika Aïoli on a Toasted Sesame Bun, served with Breakfast Potatoes.

items.title: Lamplight French Toast
items.description: Chai Tea Custard, Caramelized Peaches, Orange Bourbon Honey Glaze, Candied Pecans and Chai Tea Whipped Cream

items.title: Lamplight Chilaquiles*
items.description: House-made Tortilla Chips tossed in a 3-Chile Red Sauce, Cheddar-Jack, Two Eggs-up, Queso Fresco, Cilantro-Serrano Crema and Sliced Avocado, topped with Pepitas

items.title: Steak and Eggs*
items.description: New York Steak, Two Eggs-up, Piquillo Butter Sauce, Arugula Salad and Pickled Onions with Breakfast Potatoes

items.title: Potato Flautas
items.description: Chorizo, Piquillo Crema, Tomatillo-Serrano Salsa, Arugula and Escabèche Salad

items.title: Omelet
items.description: Egg Whites and Cheddar Jack, with "Fish" Crackers and choice of two selections: Vanilla Yogurt, Fresh Fruit, or Potatoes and choice of small DASANI® Water or small Lowfat Milk

items.title: Indulgent French Toast
items.description: Cinnamon-Brown Sugar Challah Bread, Whipped Cream and Syrup, with choice of two selections: Vanilla Yogurt, Fresh Fruit, or Potatoes and choice of small DASANI® Water or small Lowfat Milk

items.title: Mini Brunch Burger
items.description: 2 oz. Chuck Patty, American Cheese, Bacon and Egg on a Toasted Amish Bun with choice of two selections: Vanilla Yogurt, Fresh Fruit or Potatoes and choice of small DASANI® Water or small Lowfat Milk

items.title: Donuts
items.description: Ask about our seasonal offering.

items.title: Goofball Island
items.description: Simply Fruit Punch®, Minute Maid® Lemonade and Raspberry Purée

items.title: Falling with Style
items.description: Minute Maid® Lemonade with Mango Purée

items.title: Mint to Be
items.description: Simply Limeade®, Watermelon and Berry Purée and fresh Mint topped with Soda Water
a frozen Mocktail made with Strawberry Purée, Cream of Coconut and Pineapple Juice topped with Coca-Cola®

items.title: Pixar Lamp and Ball Straw
items.description: Available for purchase with any Non-Alcoholic Beverage purchase

items.title: Pixar Ball Sipper
items.description: Available to purchase with any Non-Alcoholic beverage purchase

items.title: Assorted Beverages
items.description: Coca-Cola®, Diet Coke®, Sprite®, Fanta® Orange, Minute Maid® Light Lemonade, Barq's® Root Beer and freshly brewed Iced Tea

items.title: Assorted Twinings of London® Hot Teas
Mimosa Flight
items.description: Seasonal flavors

items.title: Beer Mimosa
items.description: Blood Orange Beer topped with Fresh Orange Juice

items.title: Cinnamon Toast Cocktail
items.description: Stoli Vanilla Vodka, Frangelico, Rumchata and Cinnamon Cereal-infused Milk

items.title: Java Martini
items.description: Tequila, Coffee Liqueur, Licor 43 and Hazelnut Cream Cold Foam

items.title: Everlasting Marigold
items.description: Tequila, Cucumber, Tamarind, and Lime Juice

items.title: Hero Work
items.description: Huckleberry Vodka, Dragon Fruit Syrup, Lemon Juice and Agave

items.title: Water District Gimlet
items.description: Gin, Lychee Syrup and Lime Juice

items.title: Over Budget
items.description: Vodka, Passion Fruit Syrup, Lime Juice, Agave Nectar and Ginger Beer

items.title: Scream Canister
items.description: Rum, Cream of Coconut and Pineapple & Orange Juices with a mist of Bitters

items.title: Find Your Spark
items.description: Vodka, Raspberry Rum, Lemon Juice, Watermelon Syrup and Sparkling Wine

items.title: Sunrise Spectacular
items.description: Bourbon, Pineapple & Orange Juices, Agave Nectar and a dash of Bitters

items.title: Cobra Hiss
items.description: Mezcal, Triple Sec, Cucumber Syrup, Lemon Juice and Agave Nectar

items.title: Sea Monster Smash
items.description: Rye Whiskey, Blueberry Syrup, Mint, Lemon Juice, Passion Fruit Syrup and Blueberries

items.title: Final with a Fix
items.description: Tequila, Raspberry Liqueur, Triple Sec, Lime Juice, Agave Nectar and a spritz of Mezcal

items.title: Open Ocean with a Splash
items.description: a Frozen Cocktail made with Raspberry Rum, Blue Curaçao, Orgeat, Agave Nectar and Lime Juice

items.title: Red is a Lucky Color
items.description: Vodka, Rum, Strawberry & Raspberry Purées and Rosemary Syrup

Lamplight French Toast
items.description: Chai Tea Custard, Caramelized Peaches, Orange Bourbon Honey Glaze, Candied Pecans and Chai Tea Whipped Cream (For Fish/Shellfish, Peanut, Sesame and Soy Allergies)

items.title: Smoked Salmon Egg White Omelet
items.description: Dill Cream Cheese, Avocado and Crispy Capers, served with Green Goddess Baby Gem Salad, and Breakfast Potatoes (For Peanut/Tree Nut and Shellfish Allergies)

items.title: Brunch Burger*
items.description: Angus Beef, American Cheese, One Egg-up, Roasted Green Chile, Lettuce, Caramelized Onions and Paprika Aïoli on a toasted Sesame Bun with Breakfast Potatoes. (For Fish/Shellfish and Peanut/Tree Nut Allergies)

items.title: Steak and Eggs*
items.description: New York Steak, two Eggs-up, Piquillo Butter Sauce, Arugula Salad and Pickled Onions with Breakfast Potatoes (For Gluten/Wheat, Fish/Shellfish, Peanut/Tree Nut and Sesame Allergies)

items.title: Lamplight Chilaquiles*
items.description: House-made Tortilla Chips tossed in a 3-Chile Red Sauce, Cheddar-Jack, two Eggs-up, Queso Fresco, Cilantro-Serrano Crema and sliced Avocado, topped with Pepitas. (For Fish/Shellfish, Peanut and Sesame Allergies)

items.title: Guests must speak to a Cast Member about their allergy-friendly request
Potato Flautas
items.description: Plant-based Chorizo, Piquillo Crema, Tomatillo-Serrano Salsa, Arugula and Escabèche Salad. (For Gluten/Wheat, Egg, Fish/Shellfish, Milk and Peanut/Tree Nut Allergies)

items.title: Guests must speak to a Cast Member about their allergy-friendly request
Omelet
items.description: Egg Whites and Cheddar Jack, served with "fish" Crackers and Fresh Fruit. (For Fish/Shellfish, Peanut, Sesame and Soy Allergies)

items.title: Indulgent French Toast
items.description: Cinnamon-Brown Sugar Challah Bread, Whipped Cream, Syrup with Fresh Fruit. (For Fish/Shellfish, Peanut/Tree Nut, Sesame and Soy Allergies)

items.title: Mini Brunch Burger
items.description: 2 oz. Chuck Patty, American Cheese, Bacon and Egg on a Toasted Amish Bun with Fresh Fruit. (For Peanut/Tree Nut, Sesame and Shellfish Allergies)

items.title: Roasted Squash Panzanella Salad
items.description: Baby Kale, Sourdough Croutons, Honey Whipped Goat Cheese, Delicata Squash, Golden Raisin Vinaigrette, Pickled Red Onions, Pepitas and Persimmons

items.title: Beer-battered Onion Blossom
items.description: with Toasted Chile Aïoli, Charred Green Onion Crema, Lemon & Lime Wedges and Cilantro

items.description: with Paprika Aïoli, House Ranch, Cheddar Cheese, Bacon, Cheese Sauce and Chives

items.description: Thai Curry Cioppino, Coconut-steamed Clams & Mussels, Shrimp, Pan-seared Fish, Spaghetti, Sourdough Bread Crumbs, Crispy Shallots, Thai Basil, Cilantro and a Lime Wedge

items.description: Turnip Purée, Rainbow Carrots and Chicken Jus

items.description: Herb Salt-crusted with Whipped Potatoes, Grilled Rainbow Carrots, Wasabi Cream and Au Jus

items.description: Grilled Chicken Breast with Teriyaki Sauce, with choice of two selections: Vanilla Yogurt, Fresh Fruit or Potatoes and choice of small DASANI® Water or small Lowfat Milk. Meets Disney Nutrition Guidelines for Complete Meals without substitutions
